Text: Poor quality A/V! Much noise  for ... not much for a result... The subtitles are good... Thanks anyway

I downloaded this copy a year ago, and didn't have a TPB account then, so have to thank you now for it. It was an amazing miniseries, and thank you for making it available. :)

Um, the quality wasn't all that great, honestly, and the blurring out of the subs (or whatever it was that that was done) kind of added to the problem, but seriously, once you get into the thing you'll forget all that. Toby Stephens and Tara Fitzgerald were amazing!
